attributes.action: Nehotiate our withdrawal from the European Uniion
attributes.additional_details:
It is becoming clear that the European Union is NOT the European Economic Community (or Common Market) that we joined

It is also clear that the current union is of little or no financial benefit to the UK

If the European Union was being run as a business, not having audited accounts signed off for year after year would result in criminal charges. It is obvious, therefore, that the UK would be better served by NOT being a member of this corrupt, unanswerable, monster

A debate should be held to negotiate our exit from the European Union and use the monies we contribute to support OUR OWN COUNTRY instead of lining the pockets of faceless politicians

Thank you for reading and voting
